subject: Measure test coverage with Cobertura
msgSnippet: IBM s developerWorks has published my latest article, Measure test coverage with Cobertura , a brief introduction to the open source Cobertura test coverage
messageBody:
IBM's developerWorks has published my latest article, "Measure test
coverage with Cobertura", a brief introduction to the open source
Cobertura test coverage tool:

http://www-128.ibm.com/developerworks/java/library/j-cobertura/index.html

Cobertura is not (yet) the best test coverage on the market, but it's
good enough and it's free. If you aren't already using some sort of test
coverage tool, then you owe it to yourself (and your users) to check out
Cobertura. Reading this article is a nice way to start. Comments and
questions appreciated.

--
Elliotte Rusty Harold elharo@...
